name: Super RPS
description:
Super RPS is a tactical strategy game in which two players have a series of Rock, Paper, Scissors matches on 5 fields concurrently. Each player has a secondary deck of "Field Cards" that have special abilities that can turn the match in your favor.


Join the official BlueExabyte Discord and YouTube, linked both in game, as well as in the links to the right!


  • Online Multiplayer (1v1) play against your friends on Steam or against random players online!
  • Offline VS Bot - sharpen your skills against the bot with the scariest Artificial Intelligence: randomization
  • Strategize to beat players, select the best combo to outsmart your opponents and win
  • Customization colors to change the mood of the game
  • In game chat to talk to your friends while you play


  • Rock++ - Rock beats Paper and Scissors
  • Paper++ - Paper beats Rock and Scissors
  • Scissors++ - Scissors beats Rock and Paper
  • Rock-- - Rock loses to Paper and Scissors
  • Paper-- - Paper loses to Rock and Scissors
  • Scissors-- - Scissors loses to Rock and Paper
  • Reverse - Cards have reverse win conditions (i.e. Paper beats Scissors)
  • Equal Balance - The match on this field results in an automatic draw
  • Ultimate Draw - If there is a draw in this match, the Player who owns the field wins (CPU results in normal draw), other conditions are normal
  • Scapegoat - Auto draw, but points will randomly be assigned to a match on the field
  • Shuffle - The enemy's RPS card will be switched with another of theirs
  • Dud - No field effect
